description:
3 1/2 years later, an update!

I've added Drums, Rhythm Guitar, and the Strings parts. Rhythm Guitar and Strings need to be double checked by someone other than myself. Drums are pretty close, may need a couple of measures tweaked.

Rhythm guitar... I tried to get it close. Rhythms are there, notes are probably a step or two off.
title: Metal Kombat For The Mortal Man
